Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier signal problems near Midway. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier signal problems near Midway.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Belle Plaine/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero, due to street blockage near Belle Plaine/Milwaukee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero, then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Belle Plaine/Milwaukee.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
